qas.question: What was Madonna's debut single called?
What was the name of the second single called?
Madonna's dance singles reached which number in the "Hot Dance Club Songs" by the Billboard Magazine?

context: After Madonna signed a singles deal with Sire, her debut single, "<a0_0>Everybody<a0_0/>", was released in <a1_0>October 1982<a1_0/>, and the second, "<a2_0>Burning Up<a2_0/>", in March 1983. Both became big club hits in the United States, reaching number <a4_0>three<a4_0/> on Hot Dance Club Songs chart compiled by Billboard magazine. After this success, she started developing her debut album, Madonna, which was primarily produced by <a3_0>Reggie Lucas of Warner Bros<a3_0/>. However, she was not happy with the completed tracks and disagreed with Lucas' production techniques, so decided to seek additional help.
